name: Easy Courses
author: WPMighty

sections.description:
Easy Courses is an advanced WordPress plugin that let you easily share and sell online courses, tutorials and lectures.

The Key Features of Easy Courses

  • Unlimited course creation
  • Easy Courses management
  • Automated course assessment
  • Quiz upload and download
  • Share video, audio, text, and course files
  • Offer free and paid classes
  • WooCommerce integration
  • and more !!

Pro version Features

  • Forums & comments
  • Import/Export
  • Reports & notifications
  • More unit input/output types (form, quiz, file upload …)
  • and more !!

Get pro version now
sections.changelog:
1.2.0

  • Improved – Freemius SDK library updated to 2.5.9
  • Improved – TCPDF library updated to 6.6.2
  • Improved – PHP 8.2 compatibility
  • Improved – WordPress 6.2+ compatibility
  • Fixed – Some php warnings

1.1.0

  • Improved – Freemius SDK library updated to 2.4.5
  • Fixed – Some php warnings in certificate generation
  • Fixed – Some php warnings in assessments
  • Fixed – PHP warning [Course shortcode]
  • Cleaned – Some non used php code [Units Manager]

1.0

  • First public version.
